subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: With a star performance from Madison Bumgarner, the Giants beat the Kansas City Royals at Kauffman Stadium to became the first team in 35 years to win a Game 7 on the road.
snippet: With a star performance from Madison Bumgarner, the Giants beat the Kansas City Royals at Kauffman Stadium to became the first team in 35 years to win a Game 7 on the road.
